```{r, include = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(pixiedust)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
data.frame(
  col1 = c("<a href = 'http://battelle.org'><img src = 'images/battelle_logo.jpg', title = 'Battelle Memorial Institute'></a>", 
           "<a href = 'http://r-project.org'><img src = 'images/Rlogo.png', title = 'R Programming'></a>"),
  col2 = c("<a href = 'http://bechtelparsonsbgcapp.com'><img src = 'images/bgcapp_logo.jpg', title = 'BGCAPP'></a>", 
           ""),
  col3 = c("<a href = 'http://usm.edu'><img src = 'images/usm_logo.png', title = 'M.S. Statistics'></a>", 
           "<a href = 'http://nutterb.github.io/ItCanBeShown/'><img src = 'images/ItCanBeShown.png', title = 'Statistical Notes'></a>")
) %>%
  dust() %>%
  sprinkle_colnames("", "", "") %>%
  sprinkle(cols = 1:3, 
           height = 225,
           height_units = "px",
           width = 225,
           width_units = "px") %>%
  sprinkle_print_method("html")
```
